name: mikroe.click.c2x5wamp
short_description: 2x5W AMP click functions as an amplifier and features the TDA7491LP 2x5-watt dual BTL class-D audio amplifier. The click is designed to run on either 3.3V or 5V power supply. It communicates with the target MCU over the following pins on the mikroBUSâ„¢ line: AN, RST, CS, PWM, INT.
